ygData.subject: Re: Ra Family at BlackBurrow
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone have any info on these rat-bast**ds? What you probably encountered was a group of GM s out for fun...I once saw em show up as a family of
ygData.messageBody:
"Does anyone have any info on these
rat-bast**ds?"<br><br>What you probably encountered was a group of GM's out
for fun...I once saw'em show up as a family of named
Aviaks. They wreck havoc and shout things and basically
have a grand ole time for a while. Depending on how
freaked out you get about dying it can be a rather
amusing event...on the rare occassion it happens on
Povar...the upper levels that get wind of it will race over
for a chance to whack on a GM :)<br>In any case BB
should be as safe as it ever was now.<br><br>Yodwynn
